meanings.definition: A structure of hexagonal cells made by bees out of wax for storing honey and eggs.
meanings.sent1: The honeycombs in the beehive were filled with golden honey.
meanings.sent2: The beekeeper carefully inspected the honeycombs for any signs of disease.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bear tried to sneak a taste of the honey from the honeycombs.
meanings.sent4: The honeycombs glistened in the sunlight like tiny jewels in the hive.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of honey filled the air around the honeycombs.

meanings.definition: A sweet substance made by bees using nectar from flowers.
meanings.sent1: The chef drizzled the dessert with a generous amount of honeycombs.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed spreading honeycombs on their toast for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was packed with sandwiches oozing with honeycombs.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as the taste of fresh honeycombs.
meanings.sent5: The meadow was alive with the buzzing of bees collecting nectar for honeycombs.
